mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (memberId, courseIdx, orderPrice, orderNumber, orderDate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{courseIdx}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderNumber}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT o.idx, o.courseIdx, c.title, o.orderPrice, o.orderDate, o.orderNumber,o.memberId, o.status, o.leaveDate FROM tbl_order o JOIN tbl_course c ON o.courseIdx = c.idx WHERE o.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY o.orderDate
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order WHERE courseIdx = #{courseIdx} AND memberId = #{memberId} AND status = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_order SET status = 'D', leaveDate = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
